abstract: Anti-Globalization Movement of Russia holds second yearly Dialogue of Nations, event that aims to demonize globalization, promote self-determination and shake up Western governments; groups from Texas, Puerto Rico and Hawaii are in attendance.

headline.print_headline: Russia, Jailer of Local Separatists, Hosts Foreign Ones
headline.main: Russia, Jailer of Local Separatists, Welcomes Foreign Secessionists

snippet: A global troupe of marginal liberation movements invited to a curious gathering near the Kremlin included, improbably, four from the United States....
lead_paragraph: A global troupe of marginal liberation movements invited to a curious gathering near the Kremlin included, improbably, four from the United States.
